summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the west side of Prefontaine Place, in front of lot two (2), and a portion of lot one (1), block seventeen (17), D. S. Maynard's Plat of the town (now City), of Seattle, by constructing a concrete sidewalk thereon, fifteen (15) feet in width; also the east side of Third Avenue North South, in front of lot two (2), and a portion of lot one (1), of block seventeen (17), D. S. Maynard's Plat of the town (now City) of Seattle, by constructing a concrete sidewalk thereon, twelve (12) feet in width, and including all necessary filling to sustain said walks, in accordance with Resolution No. 585 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
